Name: T-shirts
Description: Comfortable and versatile, T-shirts are wardrobe essentials. Perfect for casual occasions and can be easily paired with jeans or shorts.

Name: Shirts
Description: Classic and stylish, shirts are suitable for both formal and casual looks. They can be worn with trousers or jeans for various occasions.

Name: Polo Shirts
Description: Polo shirts offer a smart-casual appearance. They are comfortable and ideal for a sporty yet sophisticated look.

Name: Hoodies
Description: Hoodies are perfect for a relaxed and cozy style. Great for colder weather or casual outings.

Name: Sweaters
Description: Sweaters provide warmth and style during chilly days. They come in various designs and materials to suit different preferences.

Name: Jackets
Description: Jackets are versatile outerwear options. They offer protection from the elements while adding a fashionable touch to your outfit.

Name: Jeans
Description: Jeans are timeless and versatile bottoms that can be dressed up or down. They are a staple in any wardrobe.

Name: Pants
Description: Pants are essential for a smart and formal look. They come in different styles, such as dress pants and chinos, suitable for various occasions.

Name: Shorts
Description: Shorts are perfect for warmer days or casual outings. They offer comfort and freedom of movement.

Name: Joggers
Description: Joggers are comfortable and trendy pants designed for casual and athletic wear. They provide a relaxed yet stylish look.

Name: Chinos
Description: Chinos are versatile pants suitable for both casual and semi-formal occasions. They offer a polished and refined appearance.

Name: Suits
Description: Suits are elegant and formal attire for special occasions, business meetings, or professional settings. They exude sophistication and style.

Name: Blazers
Description: Blazers are versatile jackets that can elevate your outfit. They add a touch of class and can be paired with dress pants or jeans for a stylish look.

Name: Suit Separates
Description: Suit separates allow you to mix and match jackets and pants to create a customized suit. They offer flexibility in style and fit.

Name: Workout Tops
Description: Workout tops are designed for physical activities and exercise. They provide comfort, moisture-wicking properties, and freedom of movement.

Name: Workout Pants
Description: Workout pants are specially designed for athletic activities. They offer flexibility, breathability, and comfort during workouts or sports.

Name: Athletic Shorts
Description: Athletic shorts are perfect for sports or casual activities. They provide comfort, freedom of movement, and breathability during physical exertion.

Name: Sports Jerseys
Description: Sports jerseys are apparel worn by athletes and fans to support their favorite sports teams. They showcase team logos and player names or numbers.

Name: Parkas
Description: Parkas are heavy, insulated coats designed to provide warmth in extremely cold conditions. They often feature a fur-lined hood for added comfort.

Name: Vests
Description: Vests are sleeveless garments worn over shirts or sweaters. They add a stylish layer to your outfit and provide extra warmth in cooler weather.

Name: Boxers
Description: Boxers are loose-fitting underwear that offer comfort and freedom of movement. They are a popular choice for men's undergarments.

Name: Briefs
Description: Briefs are snug-fitting underwear that provides support and a streamlined fit. They offer comfort and are suitable for various activities.

Name: Socks
Description: Socks are essential foot coverings that provide comfort and help absorb moisture. They come in various lengths and styles for different purposes.

Name: Pajamas
Description: Pajamas are comfortable sleepwear typically consisting of a loose-fitting top and pants. They are designed for relaxation and a good night's sleep.

Name: Robes
Description: Robes are loose-fitting garments worn for lounging or after bathing. They provide comfort and warmth while allowing ease of movement.

Name: Swim Trunks
Description: Swim trunks are swimwear for men, suitable for beach or pool activities. They are designed to be quick-drying and comfortable in the water.

Name: Boardshorts
Description: Boardshorts are longer swim trunks often worn for water sports like surfing or paddleboarding. They provide freedom of movement and durability.

Name: Ties
Description: Ties are accessories worn around the neck, typically with formal attire. They add a touch of elegance and style to a gentleman's outfit.

Name: Belts
Description: Belts are fashion accessories worn around the waist to secure clothing and add a stylish touch. They come in various materials and designs.

Name: Hats
Description: Hats are head coverings that provide style and protection from the sun. They come in various shapes, sizes, and materials for different occasions.

Name: Caps
Description: Caps are casual headwear with a brim that shields the face from the sun. They are popular for sports, outdoor activities, and everyday wear.

Name: Wallets
Description: Wallets are small accessories used to store money, cards, and other essentials. They come in various styles and materials for different needs.

Name: Watches
Description: Watches are timekeeping devices worn on the wrist. They not only tell time but also serve as fashionable accessories that reflect personal style.

Name: Sunglasses
Description: Sunglasses are eyewear designed to protect the eyes from sunlight and harmful UV rays. They come in various styles and lens options.

Name: Dress Shoes
Description: Dress shoes are formal footwear designed for special occasions and formal attire. They offer a sophisticated and elegant look.

Name: Casual Shoes
Description: Casual shoes are versatile footwear suitable for everyday wear and informal occasions. They provide comfort and a laid-back style.

Name: Sneakers
Description: Sneakers are athletic shoes designed for sports and everyday activities. They offer comfort, support, and a trendy, sporty look.

Name: Boots
Description: Boots are sturdy footwear that covers the foot and extends above the ankle. They provide durability, protection, and style for various purposes.

Name: Sandals
Description: Sandals are open-toe footwear that consists of straps or a sole attached to the foot with straps. They offer breathability and comfort for warm weather.
